abstract: NFL Roundup; representatives for NFL, including Commissioner Roger Goodell, and players union will meet with members of Congress to discuss holdup in starting a blood-testing program for human growth hormone; other NFL news noted.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell and representatives of the players’ union are meeting Friday with a House committee seeking a testing program for human growth hormone.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee

lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell and representatives of the players’ union are meeting Friday with a House committee seeking a testing program for human growth hormone.

headline.main: Goodell and Union to Meet With Congress on Blood Testing
headline.print_headline: Goodell and Union to Meet With Congress on Blood Testing
headline.seo: N.F.L. Representatives to Meet With Congress on Blood Testing
